item.title: LOG 3.1: Summer Solstice
item.description: 21st June, 2012 Happy Summer Solstice everyone ðŸ™‚ It has been two weeks since I got back to Germany from India. All the trees grew back their leaves in the month I was gone so everything looks and feels alive!

item.title: LfE 18: Activities and work place
item.description: 07/02/2010 Hello ðŸ™‚ It snowed one morning unexpectedly. It is Feb so I thought all that weather is over. But it lasted an hour and melted within the next two days.

item.title: Plums
item.description: Four plums on my table Dark red and ripe. Sweet and juicy. I also have chocolate cream biscuits In the shelf The sun will rise soon and
